Keywords: Cosmic , X-Men
Real Name: Gabriel Summers
Special Powers
OMEGA-LEVEL ENERGY MANIPULATION... BUT HE CAN BE DISRUPTED: When Vulcan is hit, after resolutions give him an Energy Disruption token. // Modify his defense -X, where X is his number of Energy Disruption tokens. // At the end of your turn, remove his Energy Disruption tokens and heal him that many clicks.
I AM THE UNIVERSE: Hypersonic Speed. When Vulcan uses it, after resolutions he may make a close attack targeting a character that hasn't been hit this turn.
